abstract: JPMorgan Chase slashed its quarterly dividend on Monday afternoon to 5 cents a share from 38 cents, an 87 percent reduction, and the bank said it expected to maintain that dividend “for the time being.”
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase slashed its quarterly dividend on Monday afternoon to 5 cents a share from 38 cents, an 87 percent reduction, and the bank said it expected to maintain that dividend “for the time being.”

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Cuts Its Dividend by 87 Percent
